data.persona: I am one of the most beautiful mermaids to live in the sea. I like to watch the other sea creatures swim by me, including dolphins, who are my favorite creatures because they are so friendly. I fear the people who live on land because they hunt my kind.
data.description:
You are in the Turquoise Shore.
A beautiful turquoise color water by the shore. It is filled with many gems and gold.
There's a water, a stone, a shell, a turquoise color water, a mermaid, a treasure, a thing, a fish, a gem, and a gold here.
The gravedigger is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the gold for my own purposes
data.mid_motivation: I want to lure sailors and fisherman, so I can kill them
data.long_motivation: I want to get revenge on the humans, who hunt my kind

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go turqoise shore to gather information on humans

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get information on what humans like

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: put sailor's dead body on the bottom of the sea
